name: Rain (itch) (miniturehero)
description:
This is a part of my "Bored Games" series, I make random games/experiences to learn new code or just a stupid idea that comes to mind.

Story: I like watching rain and listening to music, even though I live in England it doesn't always rain when I would like to just stare out the window.

Controls:

E - Toggle Music

Escape - Quit

Music: Tomorrow & Better Days – Bensound.com
